alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:58AM CDT until July 17 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FREMONT...SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND WESTERN PAGE COUNTIES... At 858 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Essex, or 13 miles southwest of Red Oak, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing large hail in the Malvern area. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Shenandoah, Essex, Coin, Yorktown, Imogene, Northboro and Pierce Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
